sect2.title: Proposed new documents
sect2.para: It's just too hot, I guess...

listitem.para: After much discussions on the mailinglists, having overcome loads of practical problems and having sched a lot of blood and sweat, and probably after some cursing as well, Binh Nguyen submitted the Linux Dictionary. But however curious you might be (we are, anyway), there's something about the link that makes some browsers crash, so we'd rather wait and have this fixed before linking to this document.
The Cluster HOWTO, v1.1 by Ram Samudrala, provides a general view on Linux clustering hardware and software, and discusses basic setup and maintenance of clusters.
If you combine Samba's PDC features with iptables, you get a Samba Authenticated Gateway. The HOWTO by Ricardo Alexandre Mattar is now at v1.1.1.
Svetoslav Slavtchev's XFree Local Multi-User HOWTO is getting over the child deseases with v1.1.0.
Håvard Stranden found another way of getting ATI Radeon cards to work with XFree and discusses this in v1.2 of the ATI R200 + XFree86 4.x mini-HOWTO.

If you want to do strange things with strange video hardware, such as working with very high or very low resolutions which are not supported by default in the standard XFree86 package, Eric Steven Raymond's XFree86 Video Timings HOWTO might be helpful. However, check with Chapter 2 first to see whether there's not a more elegant alternative available.

Saqib Ali's DocBook XML/SGML Processing Using OpenJade documentation v2.2.8 now includes additional information for Cocoon, the Apache XML publishing framework, which can be integrated with Tomcat, the Java servlet container, to set up your state-of-the-art application server. The important thing is to keep your JRE up to date!
Stephen Darlington's Oracle 8i for Linux Installation HOWTO is now v1.18.

sect1.title: Feedback and Contributions
sect1.para:
You can help The Linux Documentation Project by:
Reviewing one of the draft versions of the documents in progress.
Picking up one of the unmaintained documents.
Providing assitance with markup.

Please help us create this weekly newsletter. Seen a site putting in a story with a link to the LDP? Completed the translation of any HOWTO? Know of any articles about the LDP published in newspapers or magazines? You can update us by sending in links and information at feedback@en.tldp.org.
LDP Weekly News is edited by Machtelt Garrels, Torsten Schlabach and Y Giridhar Appaji Nag with help from several other people.
